form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, Form Number: NSN-7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 PLACE ICM MEDICAL SERVICES MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION FOR UNITED STATES VISAS 18/$4//$$ 17 JAN 89 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BANGKOK THAILAND NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX 87. NGO THI CAU V-20244A 5 AUG 02 (86Y) F I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: P 80 No apparent defect, disease, or disability BP 14080 The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious NI Tuberculosis, Not Active Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Chest P.A. erect position right lateral view: Increased cardiomegaly with LVE in Not Done comparison with film on 4/10/88. Unchanged DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) calcification left lung since 4/10/88 ICM Medical Services DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ 17 JAN 89 DATE READ Bangkok General Hospital SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed-indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: ELISA (WELCOME) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ Bangkok General Hospital 17 JAN89 Bangkok General Hospital OTHER SPECIAL REPORT (S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS 18 JAN 89 CLASS B PTB - CONSIDERED INACTIVE 2 SPUTUM NEG FOR AFB 16-17 JAN 89 CLASS B DISABILITY - IMP. VISION AND HEARING, CARDIOMEGALY WITH LVE APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of-the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. his Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE Dr. Kare Thorgersen hair Impen 18 JAN 89 ICM Medical Officer NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 REVISED 2-88 GPO : 988 0-209-342 DEPT. OF STATE
